    private void pwFieldActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                        
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                       

    private void pwButtonActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        
        String user = "roen";
        String pass = "a1steaksauce";
        String userInput = userField.getText();
        String pwInput = pwField.getText();
        if(userInput.equals(user) && pwInput.equals(pass)){
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "login success");
            Menu menu = new Menu();
            menu.setVisible(true);
            this.dispose();
        } else{
            JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, "Incorrect username or password. Please try again.");
        }//close else if chain

    }
